works.description:
DMCA TAKEDOWN NOTICE
Date: 01-Aug-2012

Dear Sir or Madam,

It has been brought to our attention that your website is hosting or  
providing links to unlicensed copies of copyrighted works published by  
Foxstar Studios India Pvt. Ltd.

1. Identification of copyrighted works

Copyrighted work: Cinematograph film titled "BOL BACHCHAN"
Copyright owner: Foxstar Studios India Pvt. Ltd.

2. Copyright infringing material or activity found at the following  
location(s)




The above copyright work is being made available for copying, through  
downloading, at the above location without authorization of the copy right
 
owner.

3. Statement of authority

The information in this notice is accurate, and we, Qadit Systems and  
Solutions Pvt, hereby certify under penalty of perjury that we are  
authorized to act on behalf of Foxstar Studios India Pvt. Ltd., the owner 

of the copyright in the work identified above. I have a good faith belief 

that none of the materials or activities listed above have been authorized
 
by Foxstar Studios India Pvt. Ltd., its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take
 
expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described  

above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and distribution of  
this copyright work via your company's network.

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding 

what actions you take.

Yours sincerely,

Mahesh Balan
Director
Qadit Systems & Solutions
